00027 #ifdef _WIN32

00029     // manner. MSVC isn't smart enough to know that it's safe.

00042     #define BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_INITIAL_TPL template <class Alloc = \
00043         std::allocator<detail::digit_t>, bool Threadsafe = true, bool Secure = \
00044         false>
00045     #define BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL template<class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool \
00046         Secure>

00073 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_INITIAL_TPL
00074 class nothrow_integer_t: public detail::digitmanager_t<Alloc, Threadsafe,
00075     Secure>, public any_integer
00076 {
00077     public:
00078     typedef BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE type;
00079 
00082     nothrow_integer_t();
00083     nothrow_integer_t(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE& b, bool
00084         force_thread_safety = false);
00085     nothrow_integer_t(BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(type) b): any_integer(*this, 1) {
00086         _swap(b); }
00087     explicit nothrow_integer_t(const char *str, size_t base = 10);
00088     explicit nothrow_integer_t(const char *str, char **endptr, size_t base =
00089         10);
00090     explicit nothrow_integer_t(const std::string& str, size_t base = 10);
00091     explicit nothrow_integer_t(const xint::binary_t b, bitsize_t bits = 0);
00092     explicit nothrow_integer_t(const any_integer& other, bool
00093         force_thread_safety = false);
00094     template <typename Type> nothrow_integer_t(const Type n, typename
00095         boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type* = 0);

00097     #ifndef BOOST_XINT_DOXYGEN_IGNORE
00098 
00099     nothrow_integer_t(const detail::data_t c): detail::digitmanager_t<Alloc,
00100         Threadsafe, Secure>(*c.holder()), any_integer(*this, c.length,
00101         c.negative) { data.beginendmod(); }
00102     nothrow_integer_t(const detail::nan_t& c): detail::digitmanager_t<Alloc,
00103         Threadsafe, Secure>(0), any_integer(*this, 0) { }
00104     #endif

00116         { BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE nn(n); _swap(nn); return *this; }

00173     void _swap(BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE& s) { using std::swap; swap(data,
00174         s.data); }
00175     static std::string _nan_text() { return "#NaN#"; }

00190 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00191 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE::nothrow_integer_t(): any_integer(*this, 1) {
00192     // Don't need to do anything, already preinitialized to zero.
00193 }
00194 
00196 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00197 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE::nothrow_integer_t(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE& b,
00198     bool force_thread_safety): any_integer(*this, 1)
00199 {
00200     try {
00201         data = b.data;
00202         if (!is_nan()) {
00203             data.beginendmod();
00204             if (force_thread_safety && Threadsafe == false) data.make_unique();
00205         }
00206     } catch (std::exception&) {
00207         *this = nan();
00208     }
00209 }
00210 
00212 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00213 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE::nothrow_integer_t(const char *str, size_t base):
00214     any_integer(*this, 1)
00215 {
00216     try {
00217         data.from_string(str, strlen(str), base);
00218     } catch (std::exception&) {
00219         *this = nan();
00220     }
00221 }
00222

00228     try {
00229         data.from_string(str, endptr, base);

00238     base): any_integer(*this, 1)
00239 {
00240     try {
00241         data.from_string(str.c_str(), str.length(), base);

00248 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00249 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE::nothrow_integer_t(const xint::binary_t b, bitsize_t
00250     bits): any_integer(*this, 1)
00251 {
00252     try {
00253         data.from_binary(b, bits);
00254     } catch (std::exception&) {
00255         *this = nan();
00256     }
00257 }
00258 
00260 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00261 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE::nothrow_integer_t(const any_integer& c, bool):
00262     any_integer(*this, 1)
00263 {
00264     if (c._data().is_nan()) {
00265         *this = nan();
00266     } else {
00267         try {
00268             data.duplicate_data(c._data());
00269         } catch (std::exception&) {
00270             *this = nan();
00271         }
00272     }
00273 }
00274 
00287 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00288 template <typename Type> BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE::nothrow_integer_t(const Type
00289     n, typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<Type> >::type*):
00290     any_integer(*this, 1)
00291 {
00292     try {
00293         if (std::numeric_limits<Type>::is_signed) data.set_signed(n);
00294         else data.set_unsigned(n);
00295     } catch (std::exception&) {
00296         *this = nan();
00297     }
00298 }
00299 
00300 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00301 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE& BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE::operator=(
00302     BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(type) c)
00303 {
00304     try {
00305         data = c.data;
00306         if (!is_nan()) data.beginendmod();
00307     } catch (std::exception&) {
00308         *this = nan();
00309     }
00310     return *this;
00311 }
00312 
00314 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00315 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE::operator-() const {
00316     try {
00317         if (is_nan()) return *this;
00318         BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE r(-data);
00319         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00320     } catch (std::exception&) {
00321         return nan();
00322     }
00323 }

00326 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00327 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE& BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE::operator+=(const
00328     BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE b)
00329 {
00330     try {
00331         if (!is_nan() && !b.is_nan()) data += b.data;
00332         else *this = nan();
00333     } catch (std::exception&) {
00334         *this = nan();
00335     }
00336     return *this;
00337 }

00597         return BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE::nan();

00614 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00615 template <class Type>
00616 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE::random_by_size(Type& gen,
00617     bitsize_t size_in_bits, bool high_bit_on, bool low_bit_on, bool
00618     can_be_negative)
00619 {
00620     try {
00621         detail::random_generator<Type> rgen(gen);
00622 
00623         BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE r;
00624         detail::random_by_size(r._data(), rgen, size_in_bits, high_bit_on,
00625             low_bit_on, can_be_negative);
00626         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00627     } catch (std::exception&) {
00628         return BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE::nan();
00629     }
00630 }
00631 
00633 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00634 template <class Type>
00635 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE::random_prime(Type& gen,
00636     bitsize_t size_in_bits, callback_t callback)
00637 {
00638     try {
00639         detail::random_generator<Type> rgen(gen);
00640 
00641         BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE r;
00642         detail::random_prime(r._data(), rgen, size_in_bits, callback);
00643         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00644     } catch (std::exception&) {
00645         return BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE::nan();
00646     }
00647 }

00656 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00657 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE abs(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE n) {
00658     try {
00659         if (n.is_nan()) return n;
00660         BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE r(abs(n._data()));
00661         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00662     } catch (std::exception&) {
00663         return n.nan();
00664     }
00665 }
00666 
00671 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00672 typename BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE::divide_t divide(const
00673     BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE dividend, const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE divisor)
00674 {
00675     try {
00676         if (dividend.is_nan() || divisor.is_nan())
00677             return std::make_pair(dividend.nan(), dividend.nan());
00678         typename BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE::divide_t r;
00679         divide(r.quotient._data(), r.remainder._data(), dividend._data(),
00680             divisor._data());
00681         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00682     } catch (std::exception&) {
00683         return std::make_pair(dividend.nan(), dividend.nan());
00684     }
00685 }
00687 
00690 
00692 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00693 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE square(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE n) {
00694     try {
00695         if (n.is_nan()) return n;
00696         BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE r;
00697         square(r._data(), n._data());
00698         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00699     } catch (std::exception&) {
00700         return n.nan();
00701     }
00702 }
00703 
00705 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00706 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE pow(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE n, const
00707     BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE e)
00708 {
00709     try {
00710         if (n.is_nan() || e.is_nan()) return n.nan();
00711         BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE r;
00712         pow(r._data(), n._data(), e._data());
00713         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00714     } catch (std::exception&) {
00715         return n.nan();
00716     }
00717 }
00718 
00720 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00721 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE sqrt(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE n) {
00722     try {
00723         if (n.is_nan()) return n;
00724         BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE r;
00725         sqrt(r._data(), n._data());
00726         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00727     } catch (std::exception&) {
00728         return n.nan();
00729     }
00730 }
00732 
00735 
00740 template <typename Type, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure>
00741 Type to(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE n) {
00742     try {
00743         if (n.is_nan()) return Type(0);
00744         return to<Type>(n._data());
00745     } catch (std::exception&) {
00746         return Type(0);
00747     }
00748 }

00755 std::string to_string(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE n, size_t base = 10, bool
00756     uppercase = false)
00757 {
00758     try {
00759         if (n.is_nan()) return n._nan_text();
00760         return to_string(n._data(), base, uppercase);
00761     } catch (std::exception&) {
00762         return std::string();
00763     }
00764 }

00778         return xint::binary_t();

00863 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00864 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE mulmod(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE n, const
00865     BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE by, const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE modulus)
00866 {
00867     try {
00868         if (n.is_nan() || by.is_nan() || modulus.is_nan()) return n.nan();
00869         BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE r;
00870         mulmod(r._data(), n._data(), by._data(), modulus._data());
00871         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00872     } catch (std::exception&) {
00873         return n.nan();
00874     }
00875 }

00878 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00879 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE sqrmod(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE n, const
00880     BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE modulus)
00881 {
00882     try {
00883         if (n.is_nan() || modulus.is_nan()) return n.nan();
00884         BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE r;
00885         sqrmod(r._data(), n._data(), modulus._data());
00886         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00887     } catch (std::exception&) {
00888         return n.nan();
00889     }

00893 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
00894 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE powmod(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE n, const
00895     BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE exponent, const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE modulus,
00896     bool no_monty)
00897 {
00898     try {
00899         if (n.is_nan() || exponent.is_nan() || modulus.is_nan()) return n.nan();
00900         BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE r;
00901         powmod(r._data(), n._data(), exponent._data(), modulus._data(),
00902             no_monty);
00903         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
00904     } catch (std::exception&) {
00905         return n.nan();
00906     }
00907 }

00915         if (n.is_nan() || modulus.is_nan()) return n.nan();
00916         BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE r;

00920         return n.nan();

00933 int is_prime(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE n, callback_t callback =
00934     no_callback)
00935 {
00936     try {
00937         if (n.is_nan()) return -2;
00938         return is_prime(n._data(), callback);

00940         return -2;

01136 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01137 BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE gcd(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE num1, const
01138     BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE num2)
01139 {
01140     if (num1.is_nan() || num2.is_nan()) return num1.nan();
01141     try {
01142         BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE r;
01143         gcd(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
01144         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01145     } catch (std::exception&) {
01146         return num1.nan();
01147     }
01148 }

01153     BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE num2)
01154 {

01156     try {
01157         BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE r;
01158         lcm(r._data(), num1._data(), num2._data());
01159         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r);
01160     } catch (std::exception&) {
01161         return num1.nan();

01169 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01170 int compare(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE n1, const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE
01171     n2, bool ignoresign = false)
01172 {
01173     if (n1.is_nan() || n2.is_nan()) return 2;
01174     try {
01175         return compare(n1._data(), n2._data(), ignoresign);
01176     } catch (std::exception&) {
01177         return 2;
01178     }
01179 }

01185 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01186 size_t log2(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE n) {
01187     try {
01188         return (n.is_nan() ? 0 : log2(n._data()));
01189     } catch (std::exception&) {
01190         return 0;
01191     }
01192 }

01197 #define BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(rtype, op) \
01198     template <class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure, typename N> \
01199     rtype op(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE n1, const N n2) { \
01200         return op(n1, BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE(n2)); \
01201     } \
01202     \
01203     template <typename N, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> \
01204     rtype op(const N n1, const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE n2) { \
01205         return op(BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE(n1), n2); \
01206     }
01207 
01208 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator<)
01209 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator>)
01210 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator<=)
01211 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator>=)
01212 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator==)
01213 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(bool, operator!=)
01214 BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_COMPARE(int, compare)

01218 #define BOOST_XINT_NOTHROW_ANY_MATH(op) \
01219     template <class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure, typename N> \
01220     BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE op(const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE n1, const N \
01221         n2) \
01222     { \
01223         BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE r(op(n1, BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE(n2))); \
01224         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
01225     } \
01226     \
01227     template <typename N, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool Secure> \
01228     BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE op(const N n1, const BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE \
01229         n2) \
01230     { \
01231         BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE r(op(BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE(n1), n2)); \
01232         return BOOST_XINT_MOVE(r); \
01233     }

01253 template <typename charT, typename traits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool
01254     Secure> inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>&
01255     operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT, traits>& out, const
01256     BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE n)
01257 {
01258     if (n.is_nan()) return operator<<(out, n._nan_text());
01259     return operator<<(out, n._data());
01260 }
01261 
01262 template <typename charT, typename traits, class Alloc, bool Threadsafe, bool
01263     Secure> inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>&
01264     operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT, traits>& in, BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE&
01265     n)
01266 {
01267     if (in.peek()=='#') {
01268         // Must be either #NaN# or an error
01269         char buffer[6];
01270 
01271         // These are efficient and safe, but MSVC complains about them anyway.
01272         //std::streamsize size=in.readsome(buffer, 5);
01273         //buffer[size]=0;
01274 
01275         // Replacing them with these.
01276         char *p = buffer, *pe = p + 5;
01277         while (p != pe) in >> *p++;
01278         *p = 0;
01279 
01280         std::string str(buffer);
01281 
01282         if (str == n._nan_text()) n = n.nan();
01283         else in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
01284         return in;
01285     } else {
01286         return operator>>(in, n._data());
01287     }
01288 }
01290 
01291 BOOST_XINT_INTEGER_TPL
01292 inline void swap(BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE& left, BOOST_XINT_NTINTEGER_TYPE&
01293     right)
01294 {
01295     left._swap(right);
01296 }

01308 template<>
01309 class numeric_limits<boost::xint::nothrow_integer> {
01310     public:
01311     static const bool is_specialized = true;
01312 
01313     static boost::xint::nothrow_integer min() throw() { return 0; } // Not applicable
01314     static boost::xint::nothrow_integer max() throw() { return 0; } // Not applicable
01315 
01316     static const int digits = 0; // Not applicable
01317     static const int digits10 = 0; // Not applicable
01318     static const bool is_signed = true;
01319     static const bool is_integer = true;
01320     static const bool is_exact = true;
01321     static const int radix = 2;
01322     static boost::xint::nothrow_integer epsilon() throw() { return 0; }
01323     static boost::xint::nothrow_integer round_error() throw() { return 0; }
01324 
01325     static const int min_exponent = 0; // Not applicable
01326     static const int min_exponent10 = 0; // Not applicable
01327     static const int max_exponent = 0; // Not applicable
01328     static const int max_exponent10 = 0; // Not applicable
01329 
01330     static const bool has_infinity = false;
01331     static const bool has_quiet_NaN = true;
01332     static const bool has_signaling_NaN = false;
01333     static const float_denorm_style has_denorm = denorm_absent; // Not applicable
01334     static const bool has_denorm_loss = false; // Not applicable
01335 
01336     static boost::xint::nothrow_integer infinity() throw() { return 0; } // Not applicable
01337     static boost::xint::nothrow_integer quiet_NaN() throw()
01338         { return boost::xint::nothrow_integer::nan(); }
01339     static boost::xint::nothrow_integer signaling_NaN() throw() { return 0; } // Not applicable
01340     static boost::xint::nothrow_integer denorm_min() throw() { return 0; } // Not applicable
01341 
01342     static const bool is_iec559 = false;
01343     static const bool is_bounded = false;
01344     static const bool is_modulo = false;
01345 
01346     static const bool traps = false; // I assume this means exceptions?
01347     static const bool tinyness_before = false; // Not applicable
01348     static const float_round_style round_style = round_indeterminate; // Not applicable
01349 };
